text.div:
Moderate or Severe Impairment, Better Eye, Profound Impairment Lesser Eye

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    111518009 Impairment level: better eye: severe impairment: lesser eye: blind, not further specified (disorder)
    1909000 Impairment level: better eye: severe impairment: lesser eye: near-total impairment (disorder)
    193714008 Better eye: severe visual impairment, Lesser eye: total visual impairment (disorder)
    193716005 Better eye: severe visual impairment, Lesser eye: profound visual impairment (disorder)
    193718006 Better eye: moderate visual impairment, Lesser eye: total visual impairment (disorder)
    193719003 Better eye: moderate visual impairment, Lesser eye: near total visual impairment (disorder)
    193720009 Better eye: moderate visual impairment, Lesser eye: profound visual impairment (disorder)
    23320001 Impairment level: better eye: moderate impairment: lesser eye: profound impairment (disorder)
    23672003 Impairment level: better eye: moderate impairment: lesser eye: blind, not further specified (disorder)
    30272003 Impairment level: better eye: severe impairment: lesser eye: profound impairment (disorder)
    4490000 Impairment level: better eye: moderate impairment: lesser eye: near-total impairment (disorder)
    58937003 Impairment level: better eye: severe impairment: lesser eye: total impairment (disorder)
    79004009 Impairment level: better eye: moderate impairment: lesser eye: total impairment (disorder)
